CustomField.description: Created for Shell quote template, as they always want to see currency symbols formatted as dollars and cents along with description of the line item.
CustomField.formula: CASE(CurrencyIsoCode,'CNY','£','EUR','€','GBP','£','JPY','¥','USD','$','') &( IF(Net_Total__c < 0, "-", "") & IF(ABS(Net_Total__c) >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(ABS(Net_Total__c) / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF(ABS(Net_Total__c) >= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(ABS(Net_Total__c) / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(ABS(Net_Total__c))), 3) & "." & IF(MOD(ABS(Net_Total__c) , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(ABS(Net_Total__c) , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(ABS(Net_Total__c) , 1), 2) * 100, 99)))) & " " & SBQQ__Product__r.Details__c
CustomField.label: Offer Details
